segments.text: Come on , Mary . We have to do the laundry .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have a washer down there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . We have a dryer , too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's so convenient . Where are the dirty clothes ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They are in the basement already .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But I didn't see you carry them down .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't you know that we have a laundry chute in the house ?
segments.speaker: S1
